description: This article explores IBM's pioneering contributions to open source software and blockchain technology, detailing its significant investments, projects, and innovations that have shaped the digital landscape. From Linux and Eclipse to Hyperledger and supply chain transparency, discover how IBM has influenced global technological trends.
keywords: IBM, open source, blockchain, Linux, Apache Spark, Eclipse, Red Hat, Hyperledger, supply chain, TradeLens, World Wire, AI, cloud computing, ethical tech
title: IBM's Pioneering Role in Open Source and Blockchain
